arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Gunners look to basque in victory in Bilbao
arts.sum: Arsenal return to the Champions League determined to start their campaign with authority as they travel to Bilbao to face an Athletic Club side in fine domestic form. There is extra motivation, too â€” a win would set a new record of six consecutive European victories against Spanish opposition, after triumphs over Real Madrid, Girona and Sevilla in recent seasons.
